item.title: Joned add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "How simple life is. It's as simple as this: you're hungry and you eat, you're full and you shit. Between eating and shitting, that's where human life is found. - (Houseboy + Maid, in Tales from Djakarta)" -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: Joned add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Dahulu dia selalu katakan apa yang dia pikirkan, tangiskan, apa yang ditanggungkan, teriakan ria kesukaan di dalam hati remaja. Kini dia harus diam- tak ada kuping sudi suaranya." -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: Joned add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Orang boleh pandai setinggi langit, tapi selama ia tidak menulis, ia akan hilang di dalam masyarakat dan dari sejarah. Menulis adalah bekerja untuk keabadian." -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: Joned add a quote by pramoedya ananta toer
item.description: "Dalam hidup kita, cuma satu yang kita punya, yaitu keberanian. Kalau tidak punya itu, lantas apa harga hidup kita ini?" -- pramoedya ananta toer

item.title: Joned add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Berterimakasihlah pada segala yang memberi kehidupan." -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: Joned add a quote by tan malaka
item.description: "Bila seseorang ingin menaiki tangga sosial dan kebudayaan mestilah merdeka lebih dulu dan pengetahuan tentang kemerdekaan, di Baratlah dilahirkan dan dipergunakan." -- tan malaka

item.title: Joned add a quote by Tan Malaka
item.description: "BERGELAP-GELAPLAH DALAM TERANG, BERTERANG-TERANGLAH DALAM GELAP ! " -- Tan Malaka

item.title: Joned add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us. And the world will live as one." -- John Lennon

item.title: Joned add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "If everyone demanded peace instead of another television set, then there'd be peace." -- John Lennon

item.title: Joned add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality." -- John Lennon

item.title: Joned add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "If someone thinks that peace and love are just a cliche that must have been left behind in the 60s, that's a problem. Peace and love are eternal." -- John Lennon

item.title: Joned add a quote by Marthe Troly-Curtin
item.description: "Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time." -- Marthe Troly-Curtin

item.title: Joned add a quote by Walt Whitman
item.description: "Resist much, obey little." -- Walt Whitman

item.title: Joned add a quote by Charles Baudelaire
item.description: "Always be a poet, even in prose." -- Charles Baudelaire

item.title: Joned add a quote by E. E. Cummings
item.description: "Unbeing dead isn't being alive." -- E. E. Cummings

item.title: Joned add a quote by Leonardo da Vinci
item.description: "Painting is poetry that is seen rather than felt, and poetry is painting that is felt rather than seen." -- Leonardo da Vinci

item.title: Joned add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "Forgive, O Lord, my little jokes on Thee And I'll forgive Thy great big one on me." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Joned add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "Dogs are better than human beings because they know but do not tell." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Joned add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you as certain dark things are to be loved, in secret, between the shadow and the soul." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Joned add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Joned add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Joned add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Joned add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Joned add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "You can never be overdressed or overeducated." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Joned add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "A cynic is a man who knows the price of everything, and the value of nothing." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Joned add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I think God, in creating man, somewhat overestimated his ability." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Joned add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am not young enough to know everything." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Joned add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Yes: I am a dreamer. For a dreamer is one who can only find his way by moonlight, and his punishment is that he sees the dawn before the rest of the world." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Joned add a quote by Andre Gide
item.description: "It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not." -- Andre Gide
